name: DUNGEON ECONOMY
description:
Ludum Dare 49 submission from Jeremy (dodgeblan), Ben (btkal), and Adrian.

See https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/dungeon-economy for our submission page.

-----

Patch 7/10:

  • Fixed bug where 3rd star was wrong size.
  • Fixed bug where sold stars counted towards end game.
  • Fixed bug causing wonky scaling in shop inventories.
  • Fixed bug where item collision checking wasn't done in correct order.
  • Fixed (?) bug where inventory squares sometimes can't be clicked.
  • Made stars a different colour from normal items.
  • Made shop preferred items display the correct price.
